import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './App.css' import humidity from './humidity.png' import pressure from './resilient.png' import high from './high-temperature.png' import low from './low-temperature.png' import wind from './wind.png' import travel from './immigrant.png' import eventplanner from './calendar.png' import farmer from './farmer.png' import Popup from './Popup' import './Modal.css' import { useState } from 'react' const key="a74e21e2e11290ddc996d96f101cb1c8"; const App = () => { const [city,setCity]=useState(''); const [data,setData]=useState(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const togglePopup = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); } const fetchData=async()=>{ try{ const response=await axios.get(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${key}`); setData(response.data); console.log(response.data); } catch(err){ alert('please enter city name correctly'); } } return ( <>
